successes.title: The Orbit Turntable
successes.description: An all-analog turntable for today's vinyl listener.  High-performance playback, attainably priced.

Pledges.description: Every little bit helps! Show your support and get a U-TURN STICKER.
Wear your support with an American Apparel U-TURN T-SHIRT. It's 100% cotton, 200% supportive.
Display your love for art and music with a "VINYL FOREVER" WOOD BLOCK PRINT, crafted by resident artist Abby Kaiser.
ORBIT TURNTABLE in matte black. Comes with an MDF platter, pre-fitted with an Ortofon Omega MM cartridge. (US add $25 shipping, Canada add $35)
ORBIT KICKSTARTER LIMITED EDITION in Kickstarter green powdercoat finish. Comes with an upgraded zero-resonance acrylic platter and Ortofon OM-3e MM cartridge. (US add $25 shipping, Canada add $35)

ORBIT KICKSTARTER LIMITED EDITION in BLACK. Same as the green one, but in black due to popular demand. Comes with an upgraded zero-resonance acrylic platter and Ortofon OM-3e MM cartridge. (US add $25 shipping, Canada add $35).

ORBIT KICKSTARTER LIMITED EDITION in COBALT BLUE. We are introducing this new color to celebrate reaching our $125k stretch goal. Same as the other Kickstarter Limiteds - it's powdercoated and comes with an upgraded zero-resonance acrylic platter and Ortofon OM-5e MM cartridge. (US add $25 shipping, Canada add $35).
Go all in with our KICKSTARTER BUNDLE. Includes the Orbit Kickstarter Limited Edition + "vinyl forever" wood block print + U-Turn t-shirt + sticker. (US add $30 shipping, Canada add $40)
Get the hand-painted ORBIT RENAISSANCE, designed by our resident artist. Comes fully upgraded (acrylic platter + Ortofon OM-3e MM cartridge). (US add $25 shipping, Canada add $35)

ORBIT CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE. We will work with you and our resident artist to create a truly one-of-a-kind (and fully-upgraded) turntable for you or a loved one. Your imagination is the only limit! (Available to US and Canada only)
